title.narrative: We Cannot Wait Towards an Inclusive and Diverse Women's Movement in the GHoA

description.narrative: Consortium partners and grassroots women and activists have increased capacity to track progress of gender transformative programs
Women Rights Activists and Organizations in South Sudan
Women in the Greater Horn of Africa will be leading and defining the political, social, cultural and economic agenda.
